Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Two acetaminophen - induced ALF patients reattempted suicide post - LT ( one died 8 years post - LT ) .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease | 
| --- |
| ALF |

In the paragraph, "ALF" (Acute Liver Failure) is the only entity that clearly refers to a disease. "Acetaminophen-induced ALF" is not a valid disease entity, as it is a description of a condition caused by the drug acetaminophen leading to ALF. "LT" is also not a valid disease entity, as it is an abbreviation for "liver transplantation," which is a medical procedure and not a disease.

The entity "LT" does not clearly refer to a chemical entity, it could be a abbreviation for "Liver Transplant" or "Long-term" but it is not a chemical name.
